product_name: Sherpa Adventure Gear Phoenix T-Shirt - Women's
long_description: Beautiful as well as comfortable, the women's Phoenix T-Shirt from Sherpa Adventure Gear is soft, wicking and ideal for travel. Dri-release(R) fabric is a blend of 85% polyester and 15% cotton, which wicks moisture and dries 4 times faster than all-cotton. FreshGuard(R) antimicrobial finish prevents odor. Eye-catching asymmetrical neckline has gathers on one shoulder. Phoenix T-Shirt from Sherpa Adventure Gear features a colorful bird-and-flower motif and cap sleeves.
short_description: Beautiful as well as comfortable, the women's Phoenix T-Shirt from Sherpa Adventure Gear is soft, wicking and ideal for travel.
